Statute.Title: Sahtu Dene and Metis Land Claim Settlement Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Règlement de la revendication territoriale des Dénés et Métis du Sahtu, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Northern Affairs (SI/2018-107, S.C. 2019, c. 29, s. 341(2))

CIF.Text: CIF, 1994, c. 27, other than ss. 11 and 12, in force on assent 23.06.94 see s. 13(1); ss. 11 and 12 deemed in force 22.12.92 see s. 13(2)
